de.tud.android.locpairs.controller
Class LocPairsController

java.lang.Object
  Service
      de.tud.android.locpairs.controller.LocPairsController

public class LocPairsController
extends Service

The Class LocPairsController handles communication between server and client.

mobilisServiceDiscoveryBeanCallback

de.tudresden.inf.rn.mobilis.mxa.callbacks.IXMPPIQCallback mobilisServiceDiscoveryBeanCallback
The MobilisServiceDiscoveryBean callback. Bean from type result expected. Contains list of string arrays that contain game infos.

gameInformationBeanCallback

de.tudresden.inf.rn.mobilis.mxa.callbacks.IXMPPIQCallback gameInformationBeanCallback
The GameInformationBean callback. Bean from type result expected. Contains game infos, see corresponding Bean for details.

createNewServiceInstanceBeanCallback

de.tudresden.inf.rn.mobilis.mxa.callbacks.IXMPPIQCallback createNewServiceInstanceBeanCallback
The CreateNewServiceInstanceBean callback. Bean from type result expected. Sender JID is XMPP Id for new game instance.

joinGameBeanCallback

de.tudresden.inf.rn.mobilis.mxa.callbacks.IXMPPIQCallback joinGameBeanCallback
The JoinGameBean callback. Type Result expected.

playerUpdateBeanCallback

de.tudresden.inf.rn.mobilis.mxa.callbacks.IXMPPIQCallback playerUpdateBeanCallback
The PlayerUpdateBean callback. Type Result expected. Contains player information, see corresponding Bean for details.

startGameBeanCallback

de.tudresden.inf.rn.mobilis.mxa.callbacks.IXMPPIQCallback startGameBeanCallback
The StartGameBean callback. Type Set expected. Contains association between barcodes, geopositions and cards.

startRoundBeanCallback

de.tudresden.inf.rn.mobilis.mxa.callbacks.IXMPPIQCallback startRoundBeanCallback
The StartRoundBean callback. Type Set expected. Contains active team and time frame of next round.

goThereBeanCallback

de.tudresden.inf.rn.mobilis.mxa.callbacks.IXMPPIQCallback goThereBeanCallback
The GoThereBean callback. Type Set Expected. Contains position to go to.

quitBeanCallback

de.tudresden.inf.rn.mobilis.mxa.callbacks.IXMPPIQCallback quitBeanCallback
The QuitBeanCallback. Type Result expected. Contains reason.

uncoverCardBeanCallback

de.tudresden.inf.rn.mobilis.mxa.callbacks.IXMPPIQCallback uncoverCardBeanCallback
The UncoverCardBean callback. Type Result expected. Only for confirmation purposes.

endGameBeanCallback

de.tudresden.inf.rn.mobilis.mxa.callbacks.IXMPPIQCallback endGameBeanCallback
The EndGameBean callback. Type Set expected. Contains all-time Highscore and Points.

keepAliveBeanCallback

de.tudresden.inf.rn.mobilis.mxa.callbacks.IXMPPIQCallback keepAliveBeanCallback
The KeepAliveBean callback. Type result expected. Only for confirmation purposes.

showCardBeanCallback

de.tudresden.inf.rn.mobilis.mxa.callbacks.IXMPPIQCallback showCardBeanCallback
The ShowCardBean callback. Type Set expected. Tells the client to show a specific card.
